meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Sudden</kanji> <kanji>inflation</kanji> results in a <vocabulary>sudden rise</vocabulary> of prices, aka a <vocabulary>sharp rise</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>jump</vocabulary> in prices.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
